Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Eduardo Marpons (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off William Halsey (BRO)...
Injured on 5/22/2015 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 7 weeks...
8/14/2015: Signed a contract extension with New York , $20,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2015, hitting .313 with 10 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2016, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
